ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: They will be the unbelievers, transgressors.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: These will be the unbelievers, the wicked.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: These will be the faces of the sinful disbelievers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: It is they, the disbelievers, the sinners.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Such will be the disbelieving, the wicked evil doers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: These are they who are unbelievers, the wicked.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: those -- they are the unbelievers, the libertines.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Those are the disbelievers, the wicked.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: those will be ones who denied the truth and were immersed in iniquity.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Those! they are the infidels, the ungodly.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: It is they who are the faithless, the vicious.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Such will be the Rejecters of Allah, the doers of iniquity.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Such will be the Kafarah (disbelievers in Allah, in His Oneness, and in His Messenger Muhammad (Peace be upon him), etc.), the Fajarah (wicked evil doers).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Those, they are the unbelievers, the immoral.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: These are the faithless, the vicious.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Those are the disbelievers, the wicked ones.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [80:42] Those, the people of this predicament, are the disbelievers, the profligates, those who have combined disbelief with profligacy.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Those) with such a trait (are the disbelievers) in Allah, (the wicked) the liars against Allah'. And of the surah in which 'when the sun is overthrown' is mentioned, which is all Meccan and consists of 29 verses, 104 words and 533 letters: Surah 81: The Overthrowing [al-Takwir) And of the surah in which 'when the sun is overthrown' is mentioned, which is all Meccan and consists of 29 verses, 104 words and 533 letters:
